pcanvas.draw
Class CanvasPen3D

java.lang.Object
  pcanvas.draw.CanvasPen
      pcanvas.draw.CanvasPen3D
Direct Known Subclasses:
MeshPen
public class CanvasPen3D
extends CanvasPen

An extension of CanvasPen which is used to specifically draw 3-Dimensional objects.

Field Summary

          Default radius for point draws.

          Default color for the wireframe draws.

          Whether or not we should draw objects to the screen in wireframe mode.

Field Detail

pointRadius

protected int pointRadius
Default radius for point draws.

wireMode

protected java.lang.Boolean wireMode
Whether or not we should draw objects to the screen in wireframe mode. This simply ensures that the PApplet.stroke(int) method is called before drawing.

wireframeColor

protected Colors wireframeColor
Default color for the wireframe draws.

Constructor Detail

CanvasPen3D

public CanvasPen3D(processing.core.PApplet applet)
Constructor which accepts a PApplet needed to make the calls we are abstracting from the user for simplicity in drawing objects to the canvas.

Parameters:
applet - the base PApplet needed for canvas draws.
Method Detail

plotPoint

protected void plotPoint(Point point)
Plots a point onto the PApplet canvas that will be drawn (most often in-between begin/endShape() calls}.

Overrides:
plotPoint in class CanvasPen
Parameters:
point - some Point to be drawn.

drawLine

public void drawLine(Point start,
                     Point end,
                     Colors color)
Draws a 3-dimensional line from one point to another using the provided color. Resets the stroke weight and color after drawing.

Overrides:
drawLine in class CanvasPen
Parameters:
start - and end point of the line-segment.
end - another end point of the line-segment.
color - the color to make the line-segment.

drawLine

public void drawLine(Point start,
                     Point end,
                     Colors color,
                     float strokeWeight)
Draws a 3-dimensional line from one point to another using the provided color and stroke weight. Resets the stroke weight and color after drawing.

Overrides:
drawLine in class CanvasPen
Parameters:
start - and end point of the line-segment.
end - another end point of the line-segment.
color - the color to make the line-segment.
strokeWeight - the desired weight of the line to be drawn.

                        int radius,

Parameters:
point - the Point to draw.
radius - a radius, as an integer.
color - the Colors value for the object to be drawn.

drawPoint3D

public void drawPoint3D(Point point,
                        int radius)
Draws a 3-Dimensional Point onto the canvas with a given radius. The default point color is Colors.BLACK.

Parameters:
point - the Point to draw.
radius - a radius, as an integer.

drawPoint3D

                        float radius)

Parameters:
point - the Point to draw.
radius - a radius, as a float.

drawBox

public void drawBox(Point point,
                    float size)
Draws a 3-Dimensional box onto the canvas whose center is the provided Point and whose size (distance to a face from the center) is the provided size. Default box color is Colors.BLACK.

Parameters:
point - the Point center of the box.
size - the size (distance from center to faces) of the box as a float.

drawBox

public void drawBox(Point point,
                    int size)
Draws a 3-Dimensional box onto the canvas whose center is the provided Point and whose size (distance to a face from the center) is the provided size. Default box color is Colors.BLACK.

Parameters:
point - the Point center of the box.
size - the size (distance from center to faces) of the box an integer.

drawBox

public void drawBox(Point point,
                    int size,
                    Colors color)
Draws a 3-Dimensional box onto the canvas whose center is the provided Point, whose size (distance to a face from the center) is the provided size. Default box color is Colors.BLACK and whose color is the Colors enum provided.

Parameters:
point - the Point center of the box.
size - the size (distance from center to faces) of the box an integer.
color - the provided color of the box.

drawBox

public void drawBox(Point point,
                    float size,
                    Colors color)
Draws a 3-Dimensional box onto the canvas whose center is the provided Point, whose size (distance to a face from the center) is the provided size. Default box color is Colors.BLACK and whose color is the Colors enum provided.

Parameters:
point - the Point center of the box.
size - the size (distance from center to faces) of the box a float.
color - the provided color of the box.

drawPointLabel3D

public void drawPointLabel3D(Point point,
                             java.lang.String text,
                             Vector labelDisplacement)
Draws a label next to a 3-Dimensional Point in space using a provided displacement away from that point.

Parameters:
point - the target of the label draw.
text - the text of the label.
labelDisplacement - the displacement vector from point to label.

drawSmoothShading

public void drawSmoothShading(java.util.List<Circle3D> circles)
Calls drawSmoothShading(List, Colors) defaulting the color to Colors.WHITE.

Parameters:
circles - the circles to draw smooth shading around.

drawSmoothShading

public void drawSmoothShading(java.util.List<Circle3D> circles,
                              Colors color)
Creates a 3D smooth object whose 'skeleton' is represented by the provided Circle3D objects.

Parameters:
circles - the 'skeleton' circles.
color - the color for shading.

                              int color)

Parameters:

color - the color for shading.
